name: E.D.D
description:
E.D.D, an android with a powerful A.I has been built for military application and is being tested in a facility by a group of  scientists.
However a mysterious entity awakens and begins to affect the development of the android.

E.D.D is 3D platformer and a visual-novel with a story happening in only one location getting corrupted over time.
You play E.D.D K54.232. nicknamed "Edd", a new iteration of an Android  with a powerful A.I developed by TETRA, a shady corporation. Edd must be "mentally" trained and tested to ensure the body is functioning. 

The game has two gameplay phases, a 3D platformer where you have to realise test and a visual-novel with dialogue changing according to your choices in the story.

  • A fusion between the themes and universes of Asimov and Lovecraft
  • A heavy atmosphere for the protagonist and the player
  • Unique character to discover
  • The level is filled with elements to discover. Will you disobey and explore the test area to see them ?

This is the second year project of students at e-artsup Bordeaux, in France. The game was made in 3 months based on the concept of mixing themes and universes from both Asimov and Lovecraft.

E.D.D was designed with 3 days in mind, only one came to be. In future days you would have access to different platformer and visual-novel phases according to your allegiance (rebel, neutral or loyal) defined by an invisible mechanic. The ending would have also changed with 6 of them being thought.
